name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Unity Engineer with 10+ years of experience creating high-quality applications in the domains of AI, VR, and 3D modeling. Expertise in **Unity** and **C#** programming, with a strong understanding of **Web-BIM**, **IFC**, and **glTF** standards. Proven ability to implement **Netcode**, manage **Addressables**, and enhance user experience in virtual reality environments using **NavMesh**. Skilled in Python for AI integrations, leveraging tools like **ChatGPT** to develop intelligent features and improve system functionalities.
Experience in building cloud-native applications and ensuring compliance with industry standards, enriched by a solid background in developing enterprise platforms. Passionate about driving innovation and delivering impactful software solutions that align with user needs and project goals.
